Synopsis: 
Produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and directed by Rob Marshall, "Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides" is again offering the huge dose of fun, adventure and humor that dazzled in previous installments of this saga of success. But this time in Disney Digital 3D ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢. Johnny Depp returns to his now legendary role of Captain Jack Sparrow in an action-packed tale of truth, betrayal, and the disappearance of youth. When Jack meets a woman from his past (Penelope Cruz) is not quite sure if it's love or if she is an unscrupulous con artist that he is using to find the legendary Fountain of Youth. Jack is captured by the Queen Anne's Revenge, the ship of the dreaded pirate Blackbeard (Ian McShane). Force him to join them and live an unexpected adventure that does not know who inspires more fear: Blackbeard or the woman from his past. 
The international cast is made up of veterans of the series, Geoffrey Rush in the role of the vengeful Captain Hector Barbossa, and Kevin R. Joshamee impersonating McNally Gibbs, an old comrade of Captain Jack, Sam Claflin addition that gives life to a faithful missionary, while Astrid Berges-Frisbey becomes a mysterious siren. 

Production notes: 
Fourth installment of the series' Pirates of the Caribbean.
